entry.summary: Build System / Dependencies / Chores / Documentation Changes / New Features / Other Changes (feature) / Other Changes (feture) / Bug Fixes / Refactors / Other Changes (release) / Tests / Other Changes (update) / Other Changes (upodate) /
entry.content:
moved TF copying assets into build script (40c8a187)
added more types to ignore (bc60ece2) updated manifest with new features and data (38566234) added lock files to ignore (09454a00) added new types to gitignore (d9507f0b)
updated all public data (4659b8e5)
shaders for 3d display (d1d14411) QR codes (97bacb66) theme selector & loader (cf2668e4) instrument from remotes (9b6a42b8) patterns & tap to tempo (46c0e92d) utils for location, state + flags (e0adff7f) utiilities for optimising performance (dbb106f5) Added hardware connections inc LGP (f5f511f8) Visual updates including 3D variants (29cbd8fc) Piano component for testing instruments (d6b23537) settings defaults for various sections (cd46bdc4) tests with javascript (ac607a80) mediators for passing person data (ff84261a) MIDI handling for external and 2,0 protocol (e49279aa) DOM utils, widgets and controls (0c4a39c1) icons for use sharing (e8239557) shared pug partials (d78ef560) instrument factory (bf73855c) more instruments (2a920ef1) up / down arrow icons (7227184b) 3d face model assets (96a697cb) component CSS files (26b01ca4) New styles using grid and overlays + palette (55a165cc) Polymorphic builds (899d0fdb) Capactior entry point build (c751ef09) Electron build (d0be70c4) new static build pipeline (d2c033d6) Added company logos for IEEE and AMIC (cbd7c70e) App store icons and banners (faaa615b) Fonts inc dyslexic / readable / heading / notation (1ec2f9d6)
modular display system inc. holographic (b6e5553c) icons for webstores / favicons (45fcb93e) Electron build (1bfdd3c1) UI panels for control panel (209df0f9) instrument json (7d7f7075) new options file (e1f67266) instrument factory (ea45b897)
Electron main code (253031f8)
preparation for cloudflare (ebee6e13) Updated prediction models to work with tf latest (e8b0ccd1) timing now uses micro fractions for better MIDI and for swing (a24685d5) notes and scales improved (39631b78) Beats tuning (74156e03) simplified index css as simple gateway (c1fddcfc) improved base markup, headers + a18n (4c6f93e7) actions for changelogging (1a95bafb) Set node version high with flags (77b93e1e) PWA updates (bdf27a2f) a way to load raw files, skipping processing (f0161aa8) SoundFont decoupled from data (c73138f1) opt/ error with CI in CF (d83f73c9) removed node requirement (4834387e) npm tripping up because of yarn confusion (f4d5a76d)
build system simplified (e8a61ee2)
v0.21 - simpler build pipeline (e286b96b)
tests added for various features (caa63e94)
file locations (c1d555ec) dependency locations (bfa052c3) moved all state into utils (22ce8326) oscillator instrument (f457c69e) smoother timing (ab3ab4c3)
moved state (d1c26276)
